      • findPosition

        public Where findPosition(double distance)
        Description copied from interface: PathInterpolator
        Find the position after having followed the path for a distance. If the distance is longer than the path length, the position of the end point will be set.
        Specified by:
        findPosition in interface PathInterpolator
        Parameters:
